endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific rental applicant.
Submit a new rental applicant's data for review and validation.
List all completed verifications performed for rental applicants.
Initiate a background and credential check for a rental applicant.
Retrieve the rental and payment history of a specific applicant.
Browse the list of registered rental properties to match with verified applicants.
Generate and download a compliance and eligibility report for a rental applicant.
Check the current status of a verification process by its unique identifier.
Update existing information of a rental applicant.
Cancel an ongoing or completed rental verification process by its identifier.
